org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class AbstractTickHandler<T extends Tick,C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AxisContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AbstractTickHandler<T,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of tick with configuration element
    C - type of callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoryTickHandler, LinearTickHandler, TimeTickHandler

    abstract class AbstractTickHandler<T extends Tick,C>
extends AxisContainer
    Base object to map an axis tick for axes.
    Every axis type has got own data type therefore to activate a tick callback is needed a different signature.
    It is also common to want to change the tick marks to include information about the data type.
    To do this, you need to add a callback in the axis configuration.
    If the callback returns null or undefined the associated grid line will be hidden.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
